issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

resolution.description: A fix for this issue is checked into the tree and tested.
resolution.name: Fixed

fields.summary: Trying to delete a nonexistent access key results in 500s

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.
status.name: Resolved

fields.description: *Assessment* While testing EUCA-11555 on a federated setup, the following error message was returned when attempting to delete user keys from another account using the IAM endpoint of the non-native region: {code} # euare-userdelkey -k AKIABPCXDC7NOJMJLV5G --region eng-admin@future euare-userdelkey: error (InternalError): Failed to send message DeleteAccessKeyType to service EuareInternal because: Component that caused exception is: DefaultJavaComponent{EuareInternalLocal.component}. Message payload is of type: DeleteAccessKeyType {code} When executed against the native region of the account, the following error is returned: {code} [root@e-37 ~]# euare-userdelkey -k AKIABPCXDC7NOJMJLV5G --region eng-admin@rick-ross euare-userdelkey: error (InternalFailure): com.eucalyptus.auth.AuthException: No such access key {code} *Signs* - Debug output {code} [root@e-37 ~]# euare-userdelkey -k AKIABPCXDC7NOJMJLV5G --region eng-admin@future --debug 2015-11-19 17:02:30,223 DEBUG DeleteAccessKey parsed arguments: {'UserName': None, 'dummy': True, 'security_token': None, 'url': None, 'DelegateAccount': None, 'region': 'eng-admin@future', 'AccessKeyId': 'AKIABPCXDC7NOJMJLV5G', 'key_id': None, 'secret_key': None} 2015-11-19 17:02:30,224 INFO Config finding region option iam-url 2015-11-19 17:02:30,224 DEBUG Config section future 2015-11-19 17:02:30,224 INFO Config found future::iam-url = 'https://iam.c-06.autoqa.qa1.eucalyptus-systems.com/' 2015-11-19 17:02:30,224 INFO Config finding region option name 2015-11-19 17:02:30,224 DEBUG Config section future 2015-11-19 17:02:30,224 INFO Config found future::name = 'future' 2015-11-19 17:02:30,224 INFO Config finding global option max-retries 2015-11-19 17:02:30,224 INFO Config novalue for max-retries 2015-11-19 17:02:30,224 INFO Config finding global option timeout 2015-11-19 17:02:30,224 INFO Config novalue for timeout 2015-11-19 17:02:30,225 INFO Config finding region option verify-ssl 2015-11-19 17:02:30,225 DEBUG Config section future 2015-11-19 17:02:30,225 INFO Config found future::verify-ssl = 'true' 2015-11-19 17:02:30,225 INFO Config finding user option key-id 2015-11-19 17:02:30,225 DEBUG Config section eng-admin 2015-11-19 17:02:30,225 DEBUG Config jump-to 001192988049:eng-admin::key-id (from eng-admin) 2015-11-19 17:02:30,225 DEBUG Config section 001192988049:eng-admin 2015-11-19 17:02:30,225 INFO Config found 001192988049:eng-admin::key-id = 'AKIABPOV2XJ52L3ISWEY' 2015-11-19 17:02:30,225 INFO Config finding user option secret-key 2015-11-19 17:02:30,225 DEBUG Config section eng-admin 2015-11-19 17:02:30,226 DEBUG Config jump-to 001192988049:eng-admin::secret-key (from eng-admin) 2015-11-19 17:02:30,226 DEBUG Config section 001192988049:eng-admin 2015-11-19 17:02:30,226 INFO Config found 001192988049:eng-admin::secret-key = 2015-11-19 17:02:30,226 DEBUG HmacV4Auth using auth fields.summary: DeleteKey Returns Odd Message When Deleting from Non-Native Region

comments.body: We believe this to be fixed along with EUCA-10890
